text: The New Zealand national rugby league team (), nicknamed the Kiwis, represents New Zealand in international rugby league. ==Players== ===Current roster=== The New Zealand national team squad selected for the 2023 Pacific Championships. Statistics in the table are drawn from the website, Rugby League Project and include the Final on 4 November 2023. The Kiwis used the same 17 players for all three matches in the tournament, with Naufahu Whyte an unused 18th player in each match. Danny Levi, Wiremu Greig, and Keano Kini were not used, although they did play for New Zealand A against Tonga A on 21 October 2023.
